title: supply services and purposes included in a vote referred to in Schedule 1 to the
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2004 (Section 91)
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Finance Act 2004 (Section 91) 

(Deferred Surrender to Central Fund) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited finance act 2004 (section 91) (deferred surrender central fund) order 2020

title: supply services and purposes included in a vote referred to in Schedule 1 to the
heading: 2. The sums set out in column (5) of the Schedule, amounting in the
text_raw:
2. The sums set out in column (5) of the Schedule, amounting in the 
aggregate to €215,358,000 are determined to be available for making good 
supply in the year ending 31 December 2020 for the capital supply services and 
purposes by reference to the Vote Number, Title, Capital Subheads and 
Descriptions mentioned in columns (1), (2), (3) and (4), respectively, of that 
Schedule, opposite the amount mentioned in column (5) in respect of each 
Capital Subhead. 

 
 
 
 
 
 4 [85]
